name: Symphony Under the Stars
location: Central Park Open-Air Theatre, New York City, NY
short_description: A magical evening of classical music under the night sky featuring the city’s renowned philharmonic orchestra.
long_description: Immerse yourself in a captivating night of classical music, where the beauty of live symphony meets the ambiance of an open-air venue. Central Park Open-Air Theatre hosts this three-night spectacle featuring compositions by Beethoven, Mozart, and Tchaikovsky, performed by the New York Philharmonic Orchestra. Bring a blanket, settle under the stars, and experience the timeless elegance of classical music.
return_policy_specifics: Tickets are refundable up to 48 hours before the event start time. After that, tickets are non-refundable.
